title: Serene 1Br Cottage W/ Separate Office/Studio Minutes from Square
posting_body: Lovely UNFURNISHED 1 bedroom cottage with in unit W/D.
Includes a SEPARATE 350sq feet office/studio unit
2 patio spaces to relax and unwind
Plenty of street parking
Located in a very quiet neighborhood
Minutes from grocery stores, coffee shops, restaurants and Sonoma Square
Rent is $2250/month with no utilities included.
Cat ok
ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING
1 year lease min required with 1.5x Security Deposit due at signing
First showing is THIS SATURDAY 8/6 from 3pm-5pm.
Due to high level of interest, this is the ONLY showing at this time.
Please email to obtain the exact address.
Thank you for your interest.
If you are interested in renting this unit, please come prepared.
We will ask to see a current credit report, 3 months of bank statements to verify income and 2 months of your most recent paystubs.
If we do not find a suitable renter on Saturday, we will possibly hold another open house on Sunday afternoon 8/7.
Please either text or email ONLY.
Voice-mail will not be returned.
Thanks!
